mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_count VALUES ( #{cjsj}, #{xm}, #{zjhm}, #{count}, #{zz}, #{xb}, #{mz}, #{csrq}, #{zjlx}, #{kfjl}, #{type}, #{last_rzsj}, #{last_lgbm}, #{last_lgmc}, #{last_fh} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cjsj=values(cjsj), count=VALUES (count), kfjl=values(kfjl)
mapper.select: select * FROM hotel_count where type=#{param1} AND last_rzsj BETWEEN SUBDATE(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL #{param2} hour) and SYSDATE()
